title: Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaborative learning using smartphone-based LMS, implementing social constructivist learning through role distribution and peer feedback among learners

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world applied mathematics problems with over 80% accuracy through collaborative problem-solving
Learners can reconstruct and explain learning content more than three times through peer assessment and feedback processes
Learners engage in knowledge-sharing activities with peers using digital collaboration tools at least twice weekly

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
